document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">broken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">heart </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">one </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">go </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">high </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff6c8e">prerogative </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Itself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">hath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">suffered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Unto a broken heart
